results.title: Metformin improves CD8+ T cell responses and parasitemia control via macrophage modulation during Trypanosoma cruzi infection.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ improves CD8+ T cell responses and @<m>DISEASE_Parasitemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018512 @@@parasitemia@@@ control via macrophage modulation during @DISEASE_Chagas_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D014355 @@@Trypanosoma cruzi infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Baigorri RE, Brugo MB, Hellriegel F, Viano ME, Mazzocco YL, Ana Y, Fontanari C, Vazquez-Vignale M, Aoki MP, Rodriguez-Galán MC, Motrán CC, Stempin CC, Cerbán FM. Metformin improves CD8+ T cell responses and parasitemia control via macrophage modulation during Trypanosoma cruzi infection. J Leukoc Biol. 2025 Sep 26;():. PMID: 41002117

results.title: Metformin Promotes the Protection of Mice Infected With Plasmodium yoelii Independently of gammadelta T Cell Expansion
results.text_hl: Depletion of gammadelta T cells with antibody treatment did not affect the reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Parasitemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018512 @@@parasitemia@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, suggesting that the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Parasitemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018512 @@@parasitemia@@@ was independent of gammadelta T cells.

citations.NLM: Miyakoda M, Bayarsaikhan G, Kimura D, Akbari M, Udono H, Yui K. Metformin Promotes the Protection of Mice Infected With Plasmodium yoelii Independently of gammadelta T Cell Expansion Front Immunol. 2018;9():2942. PMID: 30619302
